content: Internal server error. Try again later.

comment.text: This translation key displays an internal server error message, typically used when a server-side operation fails, and is usually shown in error dialogs or notifications. The exact location of this text may vary depending on the specific use case, but it often appears as a toast notification or within a dialog box. It aims to inform users that something went wrong and encourage them to try again later.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes "vēlreiz" which is redundant. "Mēģiniet vēlāk" is sufficient and more natural in Latvian.

The translation 'සේවාදායකයේ අභ්‍යන්තර දෝෂයකි' while literally translating to 'Internal server error', is a bit formal and not the most natural way a Sinhala speaker would express this error message. A more common and user-friendly translation would be something like 'සමහර විට සේවකයින්ට ගැටලුවක් ඇතිවිය, නැවත උත්සාහ කරන්න' (Some problem might have occurred on the server, try again).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සමහර විට සේවකයින්ට ගැටලුවක් ඇතිවිය, නැවත උත්සාහ කරන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'грешка' (greshka) is the correct spelling for 'error' in this context. The translation uses 'Интерна грешка сервера'. It should be 'Унутрашња грешка сервера' or simply 'Грешка сервера'.
While 'Покушајте поново касније' is a valid translation of 'Try again later', a more natural and common phrasing in Serbian would be 'Пробајте касније' or 'Поново покушајте'.
